Gems of Columbia
Parish Hall, Coedpoeth, Wrexham, Wales, UK Prizes - 1st £10, 2nd £3, 3rd £2. March contest (Tempest) - 1st Royal Oakeley, 2nd Coedpoeth. 4 bands competed.
July 3, 2019, 8:27 p.m. Jan. 10, 2020, 11:35 a.m.
1 Royal Oakeley Band Alexander Owen
2 Failsworth St. John's W. H. Ellwood
3 Coedpoeth Public Thomas Valentine
4 Ellesmere Port Boys Grammar School J. Garner
